description: [DEADEYE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1052) can run `cmd /c copy /y /b C:\Users\public\syslog_6-*.dat C:\Users\public\syslog.dll` to combine separated sections of code into a single DLL prior to execution.(Citation: Mandiant APT41)

external_references.description: Rufus Brown, Van Ta, Douglas Bienstock, Geoff Ackerman, John Wolfram. (2022, March 8). Does This Look Infected? A Summary of APT41 Targeting U.S. State Governments. Retrieved July 8, 2022.
